item.title: NYCB
item.description: score:24 Chances: NYCB reports Q2 earnings beat, stock rises by 5.1%. Expansion of private banking business with hires and acquisitions. Positive response to the company’s quarterly cash dividend on preferred stock. Analysts bullish on bank growth and share potential. Successful implementation of AFSVisionÂ® at Flagstar Bank.
